articles.author: Rebecca Dyer
articles.title: 12-Year Study Reveals How The Mediterranean Diet Might Affect Your Brain - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Cognitive decline is less likely in those who follow a Mediterranean diet, according to a French study of 840 people aged 65 and over.
articles.content:
Cognitive decline is less likely in those who follow a Mediterranean diet, according to a French study of 840 people aged 65 and over.

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Alzheimer's Neuropsychiatric Symptoms Linked to Brain Inflammation - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers discovered that the neuropsychiatric symptoms in Alzheimer’s disease, such as irritability, agitation, and depression, primarily stem from brain inflammation rather than amyloid and tau proteins.
